iOS.name: Settings_item_AccessibilitySettings_IncreaseContrastEnabled
iOS.description: If 'true', enables increase contrast.

iOS.name: Settings_item_Wallpaper
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains wallpaper settings. This setting doesn't support User Enrollment, and is available in iOS 8 and later. Starting from iOS 16.0 & iPadOS 17.0, when the wallpaper is set for the first time, both location will be updated. After that either location can be set separately.

iOS.name: AuthenticationMethod
iOS.description: If your organization uses multifactor authentication, select Company Portal or Setup Assistant with modern authentication, which prompts users to authenticate based on settings in Azure AD.

iOS.name: AttachAPN
iOS.description: A configuration dictionary.

iOS.name: AttachAPN_Name
iOS.description: The name for this configuration.

iOS.name: WebDomains
iOS.description: An array of domains. URLs matching the patterns listed here are considered managed.

iOS.name: ApplicationRules_item_AllowRoamingCellularData
iOS.description: If false, disables cellular data while roaming for all matching managed apps.

iOS.name: App_UserEnabledOptions
iOS.description: A dictionary of user-editable options.

iOS.name: App_UserEnabledOptions_AssistiveTouch
iOS.description: If true, allows the user to toggle Assistive Touch.

iOS.name: App_Identifier
iOS.description: The bundle identifier of the app.

iOS.name: App_UserEnabledOptions_VoiceOver
iOS.description: If true, allows the user to toggle Voice Over.

iOS.name: allowOTAPKIUpdates
iOS.description: If false, disables over-the-air PKI updates. Setting this restriction to false doesn’t disable CRL and OCSP checks.  Available in iOS 7 and later.

iOS.name: allowAssistantWhileLocked
iOS.description: If false, disables Siri when the device is locked. This restriction is ignored if the device doesn’t have a passcode set. Available in iOS 5.1 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowManagedAppsCloudSync
iOS.description: If false, prevents managed apps from using iCloud sync. Available in iOS 8 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowPassbookWhileLocked
iOS.description: If false, hides Passbook notifications from the lock screen. Available in iOS 6 and later.

iOS.name: requireManagedPasteboard
iOS.description: If true, copy and paste functionality respects the Allow Open From Managed To Unmanaged and Allow Open From Unmanaged To Managed restrictions. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowOpenFromUnmanagedToManaged
iOS.displayName: Allow Open From Unmanaged To Managed
iOS.description: If false, documents in unmanaged apps and accounts only open in other unmanaged apps and accounts. Available in iOS 7 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowPhotoStream
iOS.description: If false, disables Photo Stream. Available in iOS 5 and later.

iOS.name: allowVideoConferencing
iOS.description: If false, hides the FaceTime app. As of iOS 13, requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 4 and later.

iOS.name: forceITunesStorePasswordEntry
iOS.description: If true, forces the user to enter their iTunes password for each transaction. Available in iOS 6 and later.

iOS.name: allowDefaultCallingAppModification
iOS.description: If false, disables default calling app preference modification. The MDM Settings command to set the default calling app preference will still work when this is applied.

iOS.name: allowDefaultMessagingAppModification
iOS.description: If false, disables default messaging app preference modification. The MDM Settings command to set the default messaging app preference will still work when this is applied.

iOS.name: AllowListBookmarks
iOS.description: An array of dictionaries defining the pages that the user can visit.

iOS.name: Settings_item_AccessibilitySettings_ZoomEnabled
iOS.description: If true, enables zoom.

iOS.name: Settings_item_DiagnosticSubmission_Enabled
iOS.description: If 'true', enables diagnostic submission. If 'false', disables diagnostic submission.

iOS.name: Settings_item_Wallpaper_Where
iOS.description:
A number that indicates where to use the wallpaper, which is one of the following values:

* '1': Lock screen
* '2': Home screen
* '3': Both lock and home screens.

In iOS 16 and later, and iPadOS 17 and later, when you set the wallpaper for the first time, the system sets both the lock screen and home screen. After that, you can separately set each location.

iOS.name: Settings_item_PersonalHotspot
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains Personal Hotspot settings. This setting requires the Network Information access right, doesn't support User Enrollment, and is available in iOS 5 and later.

iOS.name: UserAffinity
iOS.description: User affinity associates devices with users. Users must authenticate to enroll with user affinity.

options.displayName: Enroll with Microsoft Entra ID shared mode

iOS.name: MaximumSecondsInactivityUntilUserLogsOut
iOS.displayName: Maximum seconds of inactivity until user session logs out
iOS.description: Available for devices running iPadOS versions 14.5 and later. Enter a value in seconds. If there isn't any activity after the value you enter, then the user session automatically signs out. If you set the value to zero (0), then the user session stays signed in. The minimum value is 30 seconds.

iOS.name: APNs_item_Name
iOS.description: The name for this configuration.

iOS.name: SafariPasswordAutoFillDomains
iOS.description: An array of domains. Users can only save passwords in Safari from URLs matching the patterns listed here. This property doesn’t disable the autofill feature itself. Supervised devices or Shared iPads need this property to enable saving passwords in Safari. Available in iOS 9.3 and later.

iOS.name: ApplicationRules_item_AllowCellularData
iOS.description: If false, disables cellular data for all matching managed apps.

iOS.name: com.apple.shareddeviceconfiguration
iOS.description: Synthetic Top Level Setting Group Collection

iOS.name: App_Options_DisableAutoLock
iOS.description: If true, the device doesn't automatically go to sleep after an idle period.

iOS.name: App_Options_DisableSleepWakeButton
iOS.description: If true, disables the sleep/wake button.

iOS.name: App_UserEnabledOptions_InvertColors
iOS.description: If true, allows the user to toggle Invert Colors.

iOS.name: App_Options_DisableTouch
iOS.description: If true, disables the touch screen.

iOS.name: allowDiagnosticSubmissionModification
iOS.description: If false, disables changing the diagnostic submission and app analytics settings in the Diagnostics & Usage UI in Settings. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9.3.2 and later.

iOS.name: allowGlobalBackgroundFetchWhenRoaming
iOS.displayName: Allow Global Background Fetch When Roaming
iOS.description: If false, disables global background fetch activity when an iOS phone is roaming. Available in iOS 4 and later.

iOS.name: allowAirPrint
iOS.description: If false, disables AirPrint.  Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: allowChat
iOS.description: If false, disables the use of the iMessage with supervised devices. If the device supports text messaging, the user can still send and receive text messages. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 5 and later.

iOS.name: safariAllowPopups
iOS.description: If false, Safari doesn’t allow pop-up windows. Available in iOS 4 and later.

iOS.name: safariForceFraudWarning
iOS.description: If true, enables Safari fraud warning. Available in iOS 4 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowCellularPlanModification
iOS.description: If false, users can’t change any settings related to their cellular plan. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: forceAirDropUnmanaged
iOS.description: If true, causes AirDrop to be considered an unmanaged drop target. Available in iOS 9 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowUnpairedExternalBootToRecovery
iOS.displayName: Allow Unpaired External Boot To Recovery
iOS.description: If true, allows devices to be booted into recovery by an unpaired device. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 14.5 and later.

iOS.name: autonomousSingleAppModePermittedAppIDs
iOS.displayName: Autonomous Single App Mode Permitted App IDs
iOS.description: If present, allows apps identified by the bundle IDs listed in the array to autonomously enter Single App Mode. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 7 and later.

iOS.name: Deferrals_CombinedPeriodInDays
iOS.description: Specifies the number of days to defer a major or minor OS software update on the device. When set, software updates only appear after the specified delay, following the release of the software update.

iOS.name: Settings_item_AccessibilitySettings_TextSize
iOS.description: The accessibility text size apps that support dynamic text use. 0 is the smallest value, and 11 is the largest available.

iOS.name: Settings_item_PersonalHotspot_Enabled
iOS.description: If 'true', enable Personal Hotspot. If 'false', disable Personal Hotspot.

iOS.name: ModernAuth_Awaitfinalconfiguration
iOS.description: Keeps the device in Setup Assistant until the first sync between the device and Intune installs policies.

iOS.name: Useraffinity_Awaitfinalconfiguration
iOS.description: Keeps the device in Setup Assistant until the first sync between the device and Intune installs policies.

iOS.name: AttachAPN_AuthenticationType
iOS.description: The authentication type for logging in.

iOS.name: SIMRules
iOS.description: An array of SIM rules, that apply to all apps.

iOS.name: AirPrint_item_Port
iOS.description: The listening port of the AirPrint destination. Available only in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: allowAutoDim
iOS.description: If set to false, disables auto dim on iPads with OLED displays.

iOS.name: allowPodcasts
iOS.description: If false, disables podcasts. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 8 and later.

iOS.name: blockedAppBundleIDs
iOS.description: If present, prevents bundle IDs listed in the array from being shown or launchable. Include the value com.apple.webapp to restrict all webclips. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9.3 and later.

iOS.name: allowSatelliteConnection
iOS.description: If false, the connection to and use of satellite services is prohibited.

iOS.name: forceWatchWristDetection
iOS.description: If true, forces a paired Apple Watch to use Wrist Detection. Available in iOS 8.2 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowMarketplaceAppInstallation
iOS.description: When 'false', the device prevents installation of alternative marketplace apps from the web, and prevents any installed alternative marketplace apps from installing apps.

iOS.name: allowOpenFromManagedToUnmanaged
iOS.displayName: Allow Open From Managed To Unmanaged
iOS.description: If false, documents in managed apps and accounts only open in other managed apps and accounts. Available in iOS 7 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowPersonalHotspotModification
iOS.description: If false, disables modifications of the personal hotspot setting. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 12.2 and later.

iOS.name: allowRCSMessaging
iOS.description: If false, prevents the use of RCS messaging.

iOS.name: allowSharedDeviceTemporarySession
iOS.description: If false, temporary sessions aren’t available on Shared iPad. Available in iOS 13.4 and later.

iOS.name: allowUntrustedTLSPrompt
iOS.description: If false, automatically rejects untrusted HTTPS certificates without prompting the user. Available in iOS 5 and later.

iOS.name: allowHostPairing
iOS.description: If false, disables host pairing with the exception of the supervision host. If no supervision host certificate has been configured, all pairing is disabled. Host pairing lets the administrator control if an iOS device can pair with a host Mac or PC. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 7 and later.

iOS.name: forceWiFiPowerOn
iOS.description: If true, prevents Wi-Fi from being turned off in Settings or Control Center, even by entering or leaving Airplane Mode. It doesn’t prevent selecting which Wi-Fi network to use. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 13.0 and later.

iOS.name: forceEncryptedBackup
iOS.description: If true, encrypts all backups. Available in iOS 4 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowAssistantUserGeneratedContent
iOS.description: If false, prevents Siri from querying user-generated content from the web. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 7 and later.

iOS.name: NotificationSettings_item_PreviewType
iOS.description: The type previews for notifications. This key overrides the value at Settings>Notifications>Show Previews. Available in iOS 14 and later.

options.displayName: Always: Previews will be shown when the device is locked and unlocked
When Unlocked: Previews will only be shown when the device is unlocked
Never: Previews will never be shown

iOS.name: SubCalAccountPassword
iOS.description: The user’s password.

iOS.name: SubCalAccountUseSSL
iOS.description: If true, enables SSL.

iOS.name: SubCalAccountDescription
iOS.description: The description of the account.

iOS.name: CardDAVPrincipalURL
iOS.description: The base URL to the user’s address book.

iOS.name: Settings_item_DefaultApplications
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains default application bundle identifiers. Currently it supports a default web browser app.

iOS.name: Settings_item_Wallpaper_Image
iOS.description: A Base64-encoded image in either PNG or JPG format to use for wallpaper.

iOS.name: MaximumCachedUsers
iOS.description: The maximum number of users that can use a Shared iPad. You can cache up to 24 users on a 32GB or 64GB device.

iOS.name: APNs_item_ProxyServer
iOS.description: The proxy server's address.

iOS.name: APNs_item_AuthenticationType
iOS.description: The authentication type for logging in.

iOS.name: APNs_item_AllowedProtocolMask
iOS.description: The supported Internet Protocol versions. Available in iOS 10.3 and later.

iOS.name: APNs_item_AllowedProtocolMaskInRoaming
iOS.description: The supported Internet Protocol versions while roaming. Available in iOS 10.3 and later.

iOS.name: App_Options_EnableMonoAudio
iOS.description: If true, enables Mono Audio.

iOS.name: App_Options
iOS.description: A dictionary of options that the user cannot change.

iOS.name: App_UserEnabledOptions_VoiceControl
iOS.description: If true, allows the user to toggle Voice Control.

iOS.name: App_Options_EnableVoiceControl
iOS.description: If true, enables Voice Control.

iOS.name: allowProximitySetupToNewDevice
iOS.displayName: Allow Proximity Setup To New Device
iOS.description: If false, disables the prompt to set up new devices that are nearby. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: allowVisualIntelligenceSummary
iOS.description: When false, disables visual intelligence summarization.

iOS.name: allowDefaultBrowserModification
iOS.description: If false, disables default browser preference modification. The MDM Settings command to set the default browser preference will still work when this is applied.

iOS.name: allowEnterpriseBookMetadataSync
iOS.description: If false, disables sync of Enterprise books, notes, and highlights. Available in iOS 8 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowLockScreenNotificationsView
iOS.description: If false, disables the Notifications history view on the lock screen, so users can’t view past notifications. However, they can still see notifications when they arrive. Available in iOS 7 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowNFC
iOS.description: If false, disables NFC. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 14.2 and later.

iOS.name: allowEnterpriseAppTrust
iOS.description: If false, removes the Trust Enterprise Developer button in Settings > General > Profiles & Device Management, preventing apps from being provisioned by universal provisioning profiles. This restriction applies to free developer accounts. However, it doesn’t apply to enterprise app developers who are trusted because their apps were pushed through MDM. It also doesn’t revoke previously granted trust. Available in iOS 9 and later.

iOS.name: allowiPhoneWidgetsOnMac
iOS.description:
If 'false', disallows iPhone widgets on a Mac that has signed in the same AppleID for iCloud. Supervised only.
Available on iOS 17 and later.

iOS.name: allowVideoConferencingRemoteControl
iOS.description: When false, disables the ability for a remote FaceTime session to request control of the device.

iOS.name: allowWebDistributionAppInstallation
iOS.description: When 'false', the device prevents installation of apps directly from the web.

iOS.name: allowESIMOutgoingTransfers
iOS.description: If 'false', prevents the transfer of an eSIM from the device on which the restriction is installed to a different device. Available in iOS 18 and later.

iOS.name: allowManagedToWriteUnmanagedContacts
iOS.displayName: Allow Managed To Write Unmanaged Contacts
iOS.description: If true, managed apps can write contacts to unmanaged contacts accounts. If Allow Open From Managed To Unmanaged is true, this restriction has no effect. If this restriction is set to true, you must install the payload through MDM. Available in iOS 12 and later.

iOS.name: Settings_item_DataRoaming
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains data roaming settings. This setting requires the Network Information access right, doesn't support User Enrollment, and is available in iOS 5 and later.

iOS.name: SubCalAccountUsername
iOS.description: The user's username.

iOS.name: DenyListURLs
iOS.description: An array of URLs that are inaccessible. Limit the number of these URLs to about 500.

iOS.name: PermittedURLs
iOS.description: An array or URLs that are accessible whether or not the automatic filter allows access. The system uses this array only when Auto Filter Enabled is true. Otherwise, it ignores this field.

iOS.name: Settings_item_AccessibilitySettings_VoiceOverEnabled
iOS.description: If true, enables voiceover.

iOS.name: Settings_item_AccessibilitySettings_ReduceTransparencyEnabled
iOS.description: If 'true', enables reduced transparency.

iOS.name: Settings_item_AccessibilitySettings_ReduceMotionEnabled
iOS.description: If 'true', enables reduced motion.

iOS.name: Settings_item_DiagnosticSubmission
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains diagnostic submission settings. This setting doesn't support User Enrollment, and is only available for Shared iPad. Available in iOS 9.3 and later.

iOS.name: Settings_item_AppAnalytics_Enabled
iOS.description: If 'true', enable sharing app analytics with app developers. If 'false', disable sharing app analytics.

iOS.name: Settings_item_VoiceRoaming_Enabled
iOS.description: If 'true', enable voice roaming. If 'false', disable voice roaming, which also disables data roaming. The setting is only available for certain carriers.

iOS.name: Settings_item_SoftwareUpdateSettings_RecommendationCadence
iOS.description:
This value defines how the system presents software updates to the user. When there's more than one available update for the user, the system behaves as follows:
* '0': Presents both options to the user.
* '1': Presents the lower numbered (oldest) software update version.
* '2': Presents only the highest numbered (most recent) release available for the device.
This value has no effect when there's only one available update; the system shows the single available update to the user regardless of the value of this setting.
Available in iOS 14.5 and later.

options.displayName: Presents both options to the user.
Presents the lower numbered (oldest) software update version.
Presents only the highest numbered (most recent) release available for the device.

iOS.name: MaximumSecondsInactivityUntilTemporarySessionLogsOut
iOS.displayName: Maximum seconds of inactivity until temporary session logs out
iOS.description: Available for devices running iPadOS versions 14.5 and later. Enter a value in seconds. If there isn't any activity after the value you enter, then the temporary session automatically signs out. If you set the value to zero (0), then the temporary session stays signed in. The minimum value is 30 seconds.

iOS.name: APNs_item_Password
iOS.description: The user's password for the APN.

iOS.name: APNs_item_ProxyPort
iOS.description: The proxy server's port number.

iOS.name: SIMRules_item_ICCIDs
iOS.description: One or more ICCIDs of SIM cards for which the 'WiFiAssistPolicy' applies. All ICCIDs in all installed Network Usage Rules payloads must be unique. An example ICCID is '89310410106543789301'.

iOS.name: com.apple.networkusagerules
iOS.description: Synthetic Top Level Setting Group Collection

iOS.name: LockScreenFootnote
iOS.description: The footnote displayed in the login window and Lock screen.

iOS.name: App_Options_EnableVoiceOver
iOS.description: If true, enables Voice Over.

iOS.name: App_Options_EnableZoom
iOS.description: If true, enables Zoom.

iOS.name: com.apple.app.lock
iOS.description: Synthetic Top Level Setting Group Collection

iOS.name: App_Options_DisableVolumeButtons
iOS.description: If true, disables the volume buttons.

iOS.name: App_Options_EnableAssistiveTouch
iOS.description: If true, enables Assistive Touch.

iOS.name: AirPrint_item_ForceTLS
iOS.description: If true, AirPrint connections are secured by Transport Layer Security (TLS). Available only in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: allowFindMyFriendsModification
iOS.description: If false, disables changes to Find My Friends. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 7 and later.

iOS.name: allowAppsToBeHidden
iOS.description: If false, disables the ability for the user to hide apps. It does not affect the user's ability to leave it in the App Library, while removing it from the home screen.

iOS.name: allowInAppPurchases
iOS.description: If false, prohibits in-app purchasing. Available in iOS 4 and later.

iOS.name: forcePreserveESIMOnErase
iOS.description: If set to true, eSIM will be preserved when a device is erased due to too many failed password attempt or the "Erase All Content and Settings" option in Settings > General > Reset. eSIM will not be preserved if the device is erased by FindMy.

iOS.name: allowCloudBackup
iOS.description: If false, disables backing up the device to iCloud. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 5 and later.

iOS.name: allowVPNCreation
iOS.description: If false, disables the creation of VPN configurations. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: allowSafari
iOS.description: If false, disables the Safari web browser app, and its icon is removed from the Home screen. This setting also prevents users from opening web clips. As of iOS 13, requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 4 and later.

iOS.name: allowAppRemoval
iOS.description: If false, disables removal of apps from an iOS device. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 4.2.1 and later.

iOS.name: allowSystemAppRemoval
iOS.description: If false, disables the removal of system apps from the device. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: forceLimitAdTracking
iOS.description: If true, limits ad tracking. Additionally, it disables app tracking and the Allow Apps To Request To Track setting. Available in iOS 7 and later.

iOS.name: NotificationSettings_item_GroupingType
iOS.description: The type of grouping for notifications for this app. Available in iOS 12 and later.

options.displayName: Automatic: Group notifications into app-specified groups
By app: Group notifications into one group

iOS.name: NotificationSettings_item_ShowInCarPlay
iOS.description: If true, enables notifications in CarPlay for this app. Available in iOS 12 and later.

iOS.name: Settings_item_DefaultApplications_WebBrowser
iOS.description: The bundle identifier of the app that will be set as the default web browser. This app must be an eligible web browser in the region of the device.

iOS.name: Settings_item_VoiceRoaming
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains voice roaming settings. This setting requires the Network Information access right, doesn't support User Enrollment, and is available in iOS 5 and later.

iOS.name: Settings_item_SoftwareUpdateSettings
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains software update settings. This setting doesn't support User Enrollment, and is available in iOS 14.5 and later.

iOS.name: RequireSharedIPadTemporarySessionOnly
iOS.displayName: Require Shared iPad temporary session only
iOS.description: Available for devices running iPadOS versions 14.5 and later. When set to Yes, users only see the Guest Welcome pane, and can only sign in as a guest user. Users can't sign in with a Managed Apple ID.

iOS.name: MaximumSecondsAfterScreenLockBeofrePasswordIsRequired
iOS.displayName: Maximum seconds after screen lock before password is required
iOS.description: Available for Shared iPads. Maximum seconds after screen lock before password is required (0-14,400 seconds). If a device has a passcode, a change to a larger value doesn’t take effect until the user logs out or removes the passcode.

iOS.name: APNs_item_Username
iOS.description: The user name for the APN.

iOS.name: AttachAPN_Username
iOS.description: The user name for the APN.

iOS.name: AttachAPN_AllowedProtocolMask
iOS.description: The supported Internet Protocol versions.

iOS.name: SIMRules_item_WiFiAssistPolicy
iOS.description:
The Wi-Fi Assist policy to apply to the SIM cards specified in the ICCIDs. See About Wi-Fi Assist <https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT205296> to learn more.
* '2': Use the default system policy for the specified SIM card(s).
* '3': Make Wi-Fi Assist switch more aggressively from a poor Wi-Fi connection to cellular data for the specified SIM card(s). This setting may increase cellular data use and may impact battery life.

iOS.name: App_UserEnabledOptions_Zoom
iOS.description: If true, allows the user to toggle Zoom.

iOS.name: App
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains information about the app.

iOS.name: App_Options_EnableInvertColors
iOS.description: If true, enables Invert Colors.

iOS.name: allowCallRecording
iOS.description: If false, call recording is disabled.

iOS.name: forceWiFiToAllowedNetworksOnly
iOS.displayName: Force WiFi To Allowed Networks Only
iOS.description: If true, limits device to only join Wi-Fi networks set-up via configuration profile. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 14.5 and later.

iOS.name: allowAppsToBeLocked
iOS.description: If false, disables the ability for the user to lock apps. Because hiding apps also requires locking them, disallowing locking also disallows hiding.

iOS.name: safariAcceptCookies
iOS.description: This value defines the conditions under which the device accepts cookies. The user-facing settings changed in iOS 11, although the possible values remain the same. Available in iOS 4 and later.

options.displayName: Prevent Cross-Site Tracking and Block All Cookies are enabled and the user canʼt disable either setting.
Prevent Cross-Site Tracking is enabled and the user canʼt disable it. Block All Cookies is not enabled, although the user can enable it.
Prevent Cross-Site Tracking is enabled and Block All Cookies is not enabled. The user can toggle either setting.

iOS.name: allowEnablingRestrictions
iOS.description: If false, disables the “Enable Restrictions” option in the Restrictions UI in Settings. In iOS 12 or later, if false, disables the “Enable ScreenTime” option in the ScreenTime UI in Settings and disables ScreenTime if already enabled. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 8 and later.

iOS.name: allowFilesUSBDriveAccess
iOS.description: If false, prevents connecting to any connected USB devices in the Files app. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 13.1 and later.

iOS.name: allowContinuousPathKeyboard
iOS.description: If false, disables QuickPath keyboard. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 13 and later.

iOS.name: forceOnDeviceOnlyTranslation
iOS.description: If true, the device won’t connect to Siri servers for the purposes of translation. Available in iOS 15 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: safariAllowJavaScript
iOS.description: If false, Safari doesn’t execute JavaScript. Available in iOS 4 and later.

iOS.name: allowAppInstallation
iOS.description: If false, disables the App Store, and its icon is removed from the Home screen. Users are unable to install or update their apps. In iOS 10 and later, MDM commands can override this restriction. As of iOS 13, this restriction requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 4 and later.

iOS.name: allowAutomaticAppDownloads
iOS.description: If false, prevents automatic downloading of apps purchased on other devices. This setting doesn’t affect updates to existing apps. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9 and later.

iOS.name: allowMailPrivacyProtection
iOS.description: If false, disables Mail Privacy Protection on the device. Available in iOS 15.2 and later.

iOS.name: RecommendedCadence
iOS.description:
Specifies how the device shows software updates to the user. When more than one update is available update, the device behaves as follows:
* "All" - Shows all software update versions.
* "Oldest" - Shows only the oldest (lower numbered) software update version.
* "Newest" - Shows only the newest (highest numbered) software update version. Only applicable on Supervised devices with iOS 18+ and MacOS 15+

iOS.name: Settings_item_AccessibilitySettings_BoldTextEnabled
iOS.description: If 'true', enables bold text.

iOS.name: Settings_item_AccessibilitySettings
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains accessibility settings. Available in iOS 16 and later.

iOS.name: Settings_item_AppAnalytics
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains settings for sharing app analytics. This setting doesn't support User Enrollment, and is only available for Shared iPad. Available in iOS 9.3.2 and later.

iOS.name: APNs
iOS.description: An array of access point dictionaries.

iOS.name: APNs_item_EnableXLAT464
iOS.description: If true, enables XLAT464. Available in iOS 16 and later.

iOS.name: APNs_item_AllowedProtocolMaskInDomesticRoaming
iOS.displayName: Allowed Protocol Mask In Domestic Roaming
iOS.description: The supported Internet Protocol versions while roaming domestically. Available in iOS 10.3 and later.

iOS.name: ApplicationRules_item_AppIdentifierMatches
iOS.description: A list of managed app identifiers, as strings, that must follow the associated rules. If this key is missing, the rules apply to all managed apps on the device. Each string in the AppIdentifierMatches array may either be an exact app identifier match (for example, com.mycompany.myapp) or it may specify a prefix match for the bundle ID by using the * wildcard character. If used, this character must appear after a period (.) and may only appear once, at the end of the string; for example, com.mycompany.*.

iOS.name: AssetTagInformation
iOS.description: The asset tag information for the device, displayed in the login window and Lock screen.

iOS.name: allowNotificationsModification
iOS.description: If false, disables modification of notification settings. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9.3 and later.

iOS.name: allowAppClips
iOS.description: If false, prevents a user from adding any App Clips, and removes any existing App Clips on the device. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 14.0 and later.

iOS.name: allowAutoCorrection
iOS.description: If false, disables keyboard autocorrection. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 8.1.3 and later.

iOS.name: forceAutomaticDateAndTime
iOS.description: If true, enables the Set Automatically feature in Date & Time and can’t be disabled by the user.  The device’s time zone is updated only when the device can determine its location using a cellular connection or Wi-Fi with location services enabled. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 12 and later.

iOS.name: allowLockScreenTodayView
iOS.description: If false, disables the Today view in Notification Center on the lock screen. Available in iOS 7 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowAirPrintCredentialsStorage
iOS.description: If false, disables keychain storage of user name and password for AirPrint. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: allowNews
iOS.description: If false, disables News. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9 and later.

iOS.name: allowVoiceDialing
iOS.description: If false, disables voice dialing if the device is locked with a passcode. Available in iOS 4 and later.

iOS.name: allowPredictiveKeyboard
iOS.description: If false, disables predictive keyboards. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 8.1.3 and later.

iOS.name: forceAirPlayOutgoingRequestsPairingPassword
iOS.displayName: Force AirPlay Outgoing Requests Pairing Password
iOS.description: If true, forces all devices receiving AirPlay requests from this device to use a pairing password. Available in iOS 7.1 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowFilesNetworkDriveAccess
iOS.description: If false, prevents connecting to network drives in the Files app. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 13.1 and later.

iOS.name: allowLockScreenControlCenter
iOS.description: If false, prevents Control Center from appearing on the Lock screen. Available in iOS 7 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowSpellCheck
iOS.description: If false, disables keyboard spell-check. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 8.1.3 and later.

iOS.name: allowImageWand
iOS.description: When false, prohibits the use of Image Wand.

iOS.name: allowUnmanagedToReadManagedContacts
iOS.displayName: Allow Unmanaged To Read Managed Contacts
iOS.description: If true, unmanaged apps can read from managed contacts accounts. If Allow Open From Managed To Unmanaged is true, this restriction has no effect. If this restriction is set to true, you must install the payload through MDM. Available in iOS 12 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: com.apple.subscribedcalendar.account
iOS.description: Synthetic Top Level Setting Group Collection

iOS.name: HideDenyListURLs
iOS.description: Hide the DenyListURLs in profiles UI in Settings > General > VPN & Device Management > profiles details.

iOS.name: FilterBrowsers
iOS.description: If true, enables the filtering of WebKit traffic.

iOS.name: Settings_item_AccessibilitySettings_TouchAccommodationsEnabled
iOS.description: If true, enables touch accommodations.

iOS.name: Settings_item_TimeZone
iOS.description: A dictionary that contains time zone settings. This setting is only available on supervised devices and doesn't support User Enrollment. Available in iOS 14 and later, and tvOS 14 and later.

iOS.name: Settings_item_TimeZone_TimeZone
iOS.description:
The Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) time zone database name.
If the 'forceAutomaticDateAndTime' restriction is set in Restrictions, this setting fails with an error. Otherwise, setting this value disables automatic time zone logic. The user is still be able to change the timezone; for example, by turning automatic date and time back on. The intention is to allow setting the timezone when automatic determination isn't be available, such as when Location Services are off.

iOS.name: ActivateCellularDataChoices
iOS.description: Activates cellular data plans for devices enabled for eSIM. The carrier must enable activation for devices before you can use this command. You can also activate any time after device enrollment.

iOS.name: AttachAPN_Password
iOS.description: The password for the APN.

iOS.name: com.apple.cellular
iOS.description: Synthetic Top Level Setting Group Collection

iOS.name: ApplicationRules
iOS.description: An array of application rules, that apply to only managed apps.

iOS.name: App_Options_DisableRingerSwitch
iOS.description: If true, disables the ringer switch. When disabled, the ringer behavior depends on what position the switch was in when it was first disabled.

iOS.name: App_Options_EnableSpeakSelection
iOS.description: If true, enables Speak Selection.

iOS.name: App_Options_DisableDeviceRotation
iOS.description: If true, disables device rotation sensing.

iOS.name: allowLiveVoicemail
iOS.description: If set to false, disables live voicemail on the device.

iOS.name: allowEnterpriseBookBackup
iOS.description: If false, disables backup of Enterprise books. Available in iOS 8 and later. Also available for user enrollment.

iOS.name: allowAppCellularDataModification
iOS.description: If false, disables changing settings for cellular data usage for apps. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 7 and later.

iOS.name: allowRadioService
iOS.description: If false, disables Apple Music Radio. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9.3 and later.

iOS.name: allowSharedStream
iOS.description: If false, disables Shared Photo Stream. Available in iOS 6 and later.

iOS.name: forceAuthenticationBeforeAutoFill
iOS.description: If true, the user must authenticate before passwords or credit card information can be autofilled in Safari and Apps. If this restriction isn’t enforced, the user can toggle this feature in Settings. Only supported on devices with Face ID or Touch ID. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: allowListedAppBundleIDs
iOS.description: If present, this property allows only bundle IDs listed in the array to be shown or launchable. Include the value com.apple.webapp to allow all webclips. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9.3 and later.

iOS.name: allowPairedWatch
iOS.description: If false, disables pairing with an Apple Watch. Any currently paired Apple Watch is unpaired and the watch’s content is erased. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9 and later.

iOS.name: allowKeyboardShortcuts
iOS.description: If false, disables keyboard shortcuts. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9 and later.

iOS.name: allowUIAppInstallation
iOS.description: If false, disables the App Store, and its icon is removed from the Home screen. However, users may continue to use host apps (iTunes, Configurator) to install or update their apps. In iOS 10 and later, MDM commands can override this restriction. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 9 and later.

iOS.name: allowiTunes
iOS.description: If false, disables the iTunes Music Store, and its icon is removed from the Home screen. Users cannot preview, purchase, or download content. As of iOS 13, requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 4 and later.

iOS.name: allowAirPrintiBeaconDiscovery
iOS.description: If false, disables iBeacon discovery of AirPrint printers, which prevents spurious AirPrint Bluetooth beacons from phishing for network traffic. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: allowESIMModification
iOS.description: If false, disables modifications to carrier plan related settings (only available on select carriers). Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: forceAirPrintTrustedTLSRequirement
iOS.description: If true, requires trusted certificates for TLS printing communication. Requires a supervised device. Available in iOS 11 and later.

iOS.name: allowPersonalizedHandwritingResults
iOS.description: If false, prevents the system from generating text in the user's handwriting.

iOS.name: Settings_item_DataRoaming_Enabled
iOS.description: If 'true', enable data roaming, which also enables voice roaming. If 'false', disable data roaming.

iOS.name: SubCalAccountHostName
iOS.description: The server’s address.

iOS.name: AutoFilterEnabled
iOS.description: If true, automatic filtering is in an enabled state. This function evaluates each web page as it loads and attempts to identify and block content not suitable for children. The search algorithm is complex and may vary from release to release, but it’s basically looking for adult language.
